trans-unit.note: Currently selected slide number read by screen reader

trans-unit.source: View is based on a snapshot of today's XCH price, a pool luck and a constant total network space. Plots of size k=32 (101.4 GiB).
trans-unit.target: La vue est basée sur un instantané du prix XCH du jour, une chance de pool et un espace réseau total constant. Tracés de taille k=32 (101.4 GiB).

trans-unit.source: Average effort to farm a block in the last 30 days.
trans-unit.target: Average effort to farm a block in the last 30 days.

trans-unit.source: Profitability based on blocks farmed on last 30 days. Estimated value (XCH) a farmer would get per TiB per day.
trans-unit.target: La rentabilité est basée sur les blocs cultivés sur les 30 derniers jours. La valeur estimée (XCH) qu'un farmeur gagnerait par pourboire par jour.

trans-unit.source: Pool space when the block has been won.
trans-unit.target: Pool space when the block has been won.

trans-unit.source: The effort that was required to farm the block. 100% is the expected estimated time to win. Lower than 100% means we farmed the block before the estimation. Higher than 100% means we took longer than anticipated.
trans-unit.target: The effort that was required to farm the block. 100% is the expected estimated time to win. Lower than 100% means we farmed the block before the estimation. Higher than 100% means we took longer than anticipated.

trans-unit.source: farmer doesn't exist, has left and/or has been removed.
trans-unit.target: farmer doesn't exist, has left and/or has been removed.

trans-unit.source: Learn how to set name here.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to set name here.

trans-unit.source: Based on farmer estimated size and netspace. This value may vary significantly.
trans-unit.target: Based on farmer estimated size and netspace. This value may vary significantly.

trans-unit.source: Estimate based on last block farmed and current estimated time to win. If the farmer never farmed one block then the creation date of the Plot NFT is used as a starting point.
trans-unit.target: Estimation basée sur le dernier bloc cultivé et le temps estimé actuel pour gagner. Si le farmeur n'a jamais cultivé un bloc, alors la date de création de la NFT de lot est utilisée comme point de départ.

trans-unit.source: Profitability based on blocks farmed on last 30 days, based on your farm space.
trans-unit.target: La rentabilité est basée sur les blocs cultivés sur les 30 derniers jours, en fonction de votre farm space.

trans-unit.source: Farmer took too long to validate the partial proof of space. Make sure your proof of space lookups are fast, and network connectivity is good. Response must happen in less than 25 seconds. Your NAS or network farming can be an issue. This happens when your disks are in use (plotting) or when waking up.
trans-unit.target: Farmer took too long to validate the partial proof of space. Make sure your proof of space lookups are fast, and network connectivity is good. Response must happen in less than 25 seconds. Your NAS or network farming can be an issue. This happens when your disks are in use (plotting) or when waking up.

trans-unit.source: Same partial proof was sent more than once. Can happen if there are duplicated plots being harvested or a signage point was advertised twice in the blockchain. Resolution: Verify the same plot id is not present in different harvesters. If you see this only every once in a while you can ignore this error.
trans-unit.target: Same partial proof was sent more than once. Can happen if there are duplicated plots being harvested or a signage point was advertised twice in the blockchain. Resolution: Verify the same plot id is not present in different harvesters. If you see this only every once in a while you can ignore this error.

trans-unit.source: Signage point is invalid or was not found in pool's node blockchain. Resolution: make sure your node is synced and connected to enough peers.
trans-unit.target: Signage point is invalid or was not found in pool's node blockchain. Resolution: make sure your node is synced and connected to enough peers.

trans-unit.source: The proof sent is not good enough for the current difficulty of the farmer. It may happen when there is a difficulty change in the pool and there were partials already in the queue to be processed. Resolution: No action needed, it should correct itself. If the problem persists contact a pool operator.
trans-unit.target: The proof sent is not good enough for the current difficulty of the farmer. It may happen when there is a difficulty change in the pool and there were partials already in the queue to be processed. Resolution: No action needed, it should correct itself. If the problem persists contact a pool operator.

trans-unit.source: Plot NFT (pool smart contract) no longer in the pool. Farmer left the pool. Resolution: Leave and rejoin the pool.
trans-unit.target: Plot NFT (pool smart contract) no longer in the pool. Farmer left the pool. Resolution: Leave and rejoin the pool.

trans-unit.source: The Plot NFT is in an invalid state. Resolution: Leave and rejoin the pool.
trans-unit.target: The Plot NFT is in an invalid state. Resolution: Leave and rejoin the pool.

trans-unit.source: Can happen when the node is on high load with block propagation delays, resulting in forked sidechains. Resolution: Make sure you are running the latest Chia version and that your computer has the minimal requirements to run a full node.
trans-unit.target: Can happen when the node is on high load with block propagation delays, resulting in forked sidechains. Resolution: Make sure you are running the latest Chia version and that your computer has the minimal requirements to run a full node.

trans-unit.source: Same as SP_REVERTED. Can happen when the node is on high load with block propagation delays, resulting in forked sidechains. Resolution: Make sure you are running the latest Chia version and that your computer has the minimal requirements to run a full node.
trans-unit.target: Same as SP_REVERTED. Can happen when the node is on high load with block propagation delays, resulting in forked sidechains. Resolution: Make sure you are running the latest Chia version and that your computer has the minimal requirements to run a full node.

trans-unit.source: The pool contract address for the partial does not match the value in the pool database. Resolution: Leave and rejoin the pool. If the issue persists contact a pool operator.
trans-unit.target: The pool contract address for the partial does not match the value in the pool database. Resolution: Leave and rejoin the pool. If the issue persists contact a pool operator.

trans-unit.source: The partial proof is not valid. Resolution: Make sure your are running the latest version of Chia.
trans-unit.target: The partial proof is not valid. Resolution: Make sure your are running the latest version of Chia.

trans-unit.source: The signature of the farmer does not match the farmer in the database. Resolution: Stop the farmer, remove all pool_list entries in config.yaml file and start the farmer again. If the issue persists leave and rejoin the pool.
trans-unit.target: The signature of the farmer does not match the farmer in the database. Resolution: Stop the farmer, remove all pool_list entries in config.yaml file and start the farmer again. If the issue persists leave and rejoin the pool.

trans-unit.source: Dates above are all in UTC.
trans-unit.target: Dates above are all in UTC.

trans-unit.source: The effort that was required to farm the block. 100% is the expected estimated time to win. Lower than 100% means we farmed the block before the estimation. Higher than 100% means we took longer than anticipated.
trans-unit.target: The effort that was required to farm the block. 100% is the expected estimated time to win. Lower than 100% means we farmed the block before the estimation. Higher than 100% means we took longer than anticipated.

trans-unit.source: No blocks found by this farmer!
trans-unit.target: No blocks found by this farmer!

trans-unit.source: Failed to authenticate! Check your URL and try again.
trans-unit.target: Échec de l'authentification! Vérifiez votre URL et réessayez.

trans-unit.source: Email may be used to contact you for any issues identified with your launcher or changes in our Terms of Service.
trans-unit.target: Email may be used to contact you for any issues identified with your launcher or changes in our Terms of Service.

trans-unit.source: If you have an email configured you will receive a notification if your launcher stops sending partials for more than one hour.
trans-unit.target: If you have an email configured you will receive a notification if your launcher stops sending partials for more than one hour.

trans-unit.source: Send a notification on payments. Only works if you have a minimum payout set.
trans-unit.target: Envoyer une notification sur les paiements. Ne fonctionne que si vous avez un paiement minimum défini.

trans-unit.source: Send a notification if the farm size has dropped significantly within a period of time.
trans-unit.target: Send a notification if the farm size has dropped significantly within a period of time.

trans-unit.source: Your launcher will not receive payments until the unpaid balance hits this minimum value.
trans-unit.target: Votre lanceur ne recevra pas de paiements tant que le solde impayé n'aura pas atteint cette valeur minimale.

trans-unit.source: Configure the difficulty for your farm so it can send less or more partials.
trans-unit.target: Configure the difficulty for your farm so it can send less or more partials.

trans-unit.source: Default - Around 600 partials sent per day
trans-unit.target: Default - Around 600 partials sent per day

trans-unit.source: Lowest - Double of partials sent per day
trans-unit.target: Lowest - Double of partials sent per day

trans-unit.source: Use above link to refer people to this pool. They will be required to join the pool and login to the website to confirm the referral.
trans-unit.target: Use above link to refer people to this pool. They will be required to join the pool and login to the website to confirm the referral.

trans-unit.source: No referrals found for this farmer!
trans-unit.target: No referrals found for this farmer!

trans-unit.source: The minimum payout has not been reached, transaction will be made at the next payment.
trans-unit.target: The minimum payout has not been reached, transaction will be made at the next payment.

trans-unit.source: What are non-portable (OG) and portable plots (NFT)?
trans-unit.target: What are non-portable (OG) and portable plots (NFT)?

trans-unit.source: Can I join a pool with non-portable (OG) plots?
trans-unit.target: Can I join a pool with non-portable (OG) plots?

trans-unit.source: Can I switch from/to your pool whenever I want?
trans-unit.target: Can I switch from/to your pool whenever I want?

trans-unit.source: How many portable plots do I need to join the pool?
trans-unit.target: How many portable plots do I need to join the pool?

trans-unit.source: How to set name in explorer? (alias)
trans-unit.target: How to set name in explorer? (alias)

trans-unit.source: Do you have any other questions?
trans-unit.target: Do you have any other questions?

trans-unit.source: Currently we charge 1% fee (before discounts). That fee is subtracted from each farmer's reward. For example, if in a given round the farmer is due a share of 0.05 XCH, then 1% of that (0.0005 XCH) will be kept as a pool fee and the rest (0.0495 XCH) will be credited to the farmer.
trans-unit.target: Actuellement, nous facturons des frais de 1 % (avant les remises). Ces frais sont soustraits de la récompense de chaque farmer. Par exemple, si dans un tour donné, le fermier a droit à une part de 0,05 XCH, alors 1% de ce montant (0,0005 XCH) sera conservé comme frais de pool et le reste (0,0495 XCH) sera crédité au farmer.

trans-unit.source: There are ways to reduce the pool base fee, check them below.
trans-unit.target: There are ways to reduce the pool base fee, check them below.

trans-unit.source: Farmers that stay with us for longer periods will gradually get discounts over the base fee.
trans-unit.target: Farmers that stay with us for longer periods will gradually get discounts over the base fee.

trans-unit.source: Up to 0.15% of discount will be subtracted from base fee in a period of up to 18 months (548 days), increased weekly.
trans-unit.target: Up to 0.15% of discount will be subtracted from base fee in a period of up to 18 months (548 days), increased weekly.

trans-unit.source: Example: After 6 months (180 days) you will get a discount of 0.0479%, effective pool fee of 0.9520%.
trans-unit.target: Exemple: Après 6 mois (180 jours) vous obtiendrez une réduction de 0,0479%, des frais de pool effectifs de 0,9520%.

trans-unit.source: Leaving the pool for more than 12 hours will reset the discount!
trans-unit.target: Leaving the pool for more than 12 hours will reset the discount!

trans-unit.source: Farm being offline or stop sending partials will NOT reset the discount.
trans-unit.target: Farm being offline or stop sending partials will NOT reset the discount.

trans-unit.source: Farmers can get discount based on their farm size:
trans-unit.target: Farmers can get discount based on their farm size:

trans-unit.source: The combination of discounts will not exceed 0.25%!
trans-unit.target: The combination of discounts will not exceed 0.25%!

trans-unit.source: We use PPLNS (Pay Per Last N Shares) to distribute rewards. When a block is won, each farmer will receive the share correspondent of the last 24 hours of partials sent to the pool.
trans-unit.target: We use PPLNS (Pay Per Last N Shares) to distribute rewards. When a block is won, each farmer will receive the share correspondent of the last 24 hours of partials sent to the pool.

trans-unit.source: Payouts will happen within 5 minutes of the farmed block. These terms are subject to change. Changes will be communicated on this website and on Discord channel 1 week before taking effect.
trans-unit.target: Payouts will happen within 5 minutes of the farmed block. These terms are subject to change. Changes will be communicated on this website and on Discord channel 1 week before taking effect.

trans-unit.source: From now on OpenChia will no longer be doing weekly giveaways.
trans-unit.target: From now on OpenChia will no longer be doing weekly giveaways.

trans-unit.source: We have decided to stop running weekly giveaways for a number of reasons.
trans-unit.target: We have decided to stop running weekly giveaways for a number of reasons.

trans-unit.source: First of all, we have noticed little to no engagement from our community in regards to that. We often found ourselves doing the livestream to draw the winner number and we did not have anybody watching and the number of views afterwards were also very slim.
trans-unit.target: First of all, we have noticed little to no engagement from our community in regards to that. We often found ourselves doing the livestream to draw the winner number and we did not have anybody watching and the number of views afterwards were also very slim.

trans-unit.source: A poll was made in our Discord and Twitter regarding the giveaway versus discount fees for all farmers. It turns out people preferred discount fees and that is what we implemented and pushed live before ending the giveaway.
trans-unit.target: A poll was made in our Discord and Twitter regarding the giveaway versus discount fees for all farmers. It turns out people preferred discount fees and that is what we implemented and pushed live before ending the giveaway.

trans-unit.source: Finally, the giveaway is no longer creating the interest and return that we were hoping for and given pooling’s thin margins it makes little sense to continue increasing debt unnecessarily.
trans-unit.target: Finally, the giveaway is no longer creating the interest and return that we were hoping for and given pooling’s thin margins it makes little sense to continue increasing debt unnecessarily.

trans-unit.source: We hope you all understand the decision.
trans-unit.target: Nous espérons que vous comprenez tous la décision.

trans-unit.source: Make sure you are using official Chia client supporting pool plots (1.2.0 or later).
trans-unit.target: Assurez-vous que vous utilisez le client officiel de Chia qui supporte les parcelles de pool (1.2.0 ou ultérieur).

trans-unit.source: Before joining pool, your node and wallet must be fully synchronized with Chia blockchain.
trans-unit.target: Before joining pool, your node and wallet must be fully synchronized with Chia blockchain.

trans-unit.source: You are going to need 1 Mojo (0.000000000001 XCH) which you can get through our faucet services
trans-unit.target: You are going to need 1 Mojo (0.000000000001 XCH) which you can get through our faucet services

trans-unit.source: Depending on your location, use one of the following connections
trans-unit.target: Depending on your location, use one of the following connections
Rejoindre le pool depuis le CLI

trans-unit.source: It will ask for your confirmation, check all details and confirm with Y.
trans-unit.target: It will ask for your confirmation, check all details and confirm with Y.

trans-unit.source: Open the Chia GUI and click "Pool" and then "Join a pool"
trans-unit.target: Ouvrez l'interface Chia et cliquez sur "Groupe" puis "Rejoignez un groupe"

trans-unit.source: Choose "Connect to pool" and enter this URL "https://pool.openchia.io" (exactly, no ending slash), verify pool details and click on "Create" button
trans-unit.target: Choose "Connect to pool" and enter this URL "https://pool.openchia.io" (exactly, no ending slash), verify pool details and click on "Create" button

trans-unit.source: Confirm pool connection and you can create Plot NFT
trans-unit.target: Confirm pool connection and you can create Plot NFT

trans-unit.source: Should you run into issues, reach out in
trans-unit.target: Should you run into issues, reach out in

trans-unit.source: Discord channel if you have any questions. OpenChia have a great community
trans-unit.target: Discord channel if you have any questions. OpenChia have a great community

trans-unit.source: All our software is open source.
trans-unit.target: Tout notre logiciel est open source.

trans-unit.source: Native mobile app on both Android and iOS for your travels. Be alerted when blocks are found.
trans-unit.target: Native mobile app on both Android and iOS for your travels. Be alerted when blocks are found.

trans-unit.source: Get your reward as soon as possible with PPLNS distribution system. Only 1% fee, read more.
trans-unit.target: Get your reward as soon as possible with PPLNS distribution system. Only 1% fee, read more.

trans-unit.source: All our software (api, pool, bot, web, mobile) are open source and available on Github repositories.
trans-unit.target: All our software (api, pool, bot, web, mobile) are open source and available on Github repositories.

trans-unit.source: Farmers can get up to 0.25% of discount in the pool fee based on their estimated size and length of stay, read more.
trans-unit.target: Farmers can get up to 0.25% of discount in the pool fee based on their estimated size and length of stay, read more.

trans-unit.source: Set https://pool.openchia.io as the pool URL for your PlotNFT using either the Chia GUI/CLI. Our OpenChia community can help you on the Discord server. Ready? Let's go!
trans-unit.target: Définissez https://pool.openchia.io comme l'URL du pool pour votre PlotNFT en utilisant soit le GUI/CLI Chia. Notre communauté OpenChia peut vous aider sur le serveur Discord. Prêt ? Allons-y!

trans-unit.source: The bigger your farmer the bigger the discount!
trans-unit.target: The bigger your farmer the bigger the discount!

trans-unit.source: The longer you stay the bigger the discount!
trans-unit.target: The longer you stay the bigger the discount!

trans-unit.source: Up to 0.25% of fee discount, effective final fee of 0.75%.
trans-unit.target: Up to 0.25% of fee discount, effective final fee of 0.75%.

trans-unit.source: Monitor pool, farm stats, payouts and more anywhere with our mobile app. Available for both Android and iOS.
trans-unit.target: Monitor pool, farm stats, payouts and more anywhere with our mobile app. Available for both Android and iOS.

trans-unit.source: All our software (pool, api, website, discord bot, mobile application) are open source and it's very important for the community. You have an idea? Submit your improvement code or create an issue. It's easy and anyone can participate!
trans-unit.target: All our software (pool, api, website, discord bot, mobile application) are open source and it's very important for the community. You have an idea? Submit your improvement code or create an issue. It's easy and anyone can participate!

trans-unit.source: Have you asked yourself who are the people running Chia pools? Do you trust them? We have more than 20 years of combined experience in the software development industry.
trans-unit.target: Have you asked yourself who are the people running Chia pools? Do you trust them? We have more than 20 years of combined experience in the software development industry.

trans-unit.source: is new generation Chia blockchain explorer and analytics platform. Developed by a small team of Chia enthusiasts, who aim to bring out in-depth information's from Blockchain and make it widely available to Chia community and developers
trans-unit.target: is new generation Chia blockchain explorer and analytics platform. Developed by a small team of Chia enthusiasts, who aim to bring out in-depth information's from Blockchain and make it widely available to Chia community and developers

trans-unit.source: They are offering cutting-edge cryptocurrency technology of today and tomorrow. Vivid Stake Pool allows you to stake in Cardano. If you deposit your Fiat Money on your bank account, you will receive 1-3 % profit per year which will be paid after at least a few months. In Cardano it is the opposite: you receive high profits as high as 5-8 % per year which is paid every 5 days!
trans-unit.target: They are offering cutting-edge cryptocurrency technology of today and tomorrow. Vivid Stake Pool allows you to stake in Cardano. If you deposit your Fiat Money on your bank account, you will receive 1-3 % profit per year which will be paid after at least a few months. In Cardano it is the opposite: you receive high profits as high as 5-8 % per year which is paid every 5 days!

trans-unit.source: OpenChia believes that in a future blockchain and cryptocurrency can exist without degrading the environment and helping make the world a better place. We believe Chia and Cardano can coexist to help make that happen. If you'd like to know more about Cardano and/or join a legitimate staking pool please visit
trans-unit.target: OpenChia believes that in a future blockchain and cryptocurrency can exist without degrading the environment and helping make the world a better place. We believe Chia and Cardano can coexist to help make that happen. If you'd like to know more about Cardano and/or join a legitimate staking pool please visit

trans-unit.source: Earn XCH by referring your friends to this pool!
trans-unit.target: Earn XCH by referring your friends to this pool!

trans-unit.source: Refer your friends to this pool using the URL https://openchia.io?referrer=YOUR_LAUNCHER_ID. Replace YOUR_LAUNCHER_ID with the Launcher ID from your Plot NFT.
trans-unit.target: Refer your friends to this pool using the URL https://openchia.io?referrer=YOUR_LAUNCHER_ID. Replace YOUR_LAUNCHER_ID with the Launcher ID from your Plot NFT.

trans-unit.source: Have your friend join the pool and login to the pool website using the Plot NFT login link. He will confirm you are his referrer. (Referrer is filled automatically if he visited the website with your referral URL)
trans-unit.target: Have your friend join the pool and login to the pool website using the Plot NFT login link. He will confirm you are his referrer. (Referrer is filled automatically if he visited the website with your referral URL)

trans-unit.source: You will receive 20% of the pool fee for every payment made to your friend. That value comes out of the pool and not from your friend reward!
trans-unit.target: You will receive 20% of the pool fee for every payment made to your friend. That value comes out of the pool and not from your friend reward!

trans-unit.source: How do I check my referrals?
trans-unit.target: How do I check my referrals?

trans-unit.source: Login to the pool website using your Plot NFT login link and go to the "Referrals" tab.
trans-unit.target: Login to the pool website using your Plot NFT login link and go to the "Referrals" tab.

trans-unit.source: Use of good faith and don't refer yourself in any shape or form.
trans-unit.target: Use of good faith and don't refer yourself in any shape or form.

trans-unit.source: Do not attempt close loop of referral. e.g. A -> B -> C -> A.
trans-unit.target: Do not attempt close loop of referral. e.g. A -> B -> C -> A.

trans-unit.source: We reserve the right to change fees for new referrals at any time.
trans-unit.target: We reserve the right to change fees for new referrals at any time.

trans-unit.source: Let's get in touch on any of these platforms.
trans-unit.target: Let's get in touch on any of these platforms.

trans-unit.source: Dust storm currently affecting the blockchain. Payouts may be delayed.
trans-unit.target: Tempête de poussière affectant actuellement la blockchain. Les paiements peuvent être retardés.
